Package weka.core.converters

Interface BatchConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArffLoader, ArffSaver, C45Loader, C45Saver, CSVLoader, CSVSaver, DatabaseLoader, DatabaseSaver, DictionarySaver, JSONLoader, JSONSaver, LibSVMLoader, LibSVMSaver, MatlabLoader, MatlabSaver, SerializedInstancesLoader, SerializedInstancesSaver, SVMLightLoader, SVMLightSaver, TextDirectoryLoader, XRFFLoader, XRFFSaver
public interface BatchConverter
Marker interface for a loader/saver that can retrieve instances in batch mode
